SEARCH
Package domain.controllers

Class FormController

java.lang.Object
domain.controllers.FormController
public class FormController extends Object
Controller class for managing forms, questions, and answers

    • getExistingForms

      public HashMap<Integer,Form> getExistingForms()
      Gets a hash map containing the existing forms
      Returns:
      Calls a function in DataManager to get the forms and returns it, as a HashMap with UFID as key and Form as value

    • getForm

      public Form getForm(int UFID) throws IdNotFoundException
      Gets a form by its UFID
      Parameters:
      UFID - The unique identifier of the form
      Returns:
      Calls a function in DataManager to get the form and returns it
      Throws:
      IdNotFoundException - if the form does not exist

      Parameters:
      title - The title of the form

      Calls a function in DataManager to get the form and returns it

    • getQuestionsWithMetadataFromForm

      public ArrayList<String> getQuestionsWithMetadataFromForm(int formID) throws FormException
      Devuelve una lista de preguntas con metadatos (tipo, opciones, bounds, maxChoices) en formato String para mostrar en el driver
      Parameters:
      formID - El identificador único del formulario
      Returns:
      Un ArrayList de Strings, cada uno describe la pregunta y sus metadatos
      Throws:
      FormException - si hay un error al recuperar las preguntas (IdNotFoundException)

      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • deleteQuestion

      public void deleteQuestion(int UFID, int questionIndex) throws FormException
      Deletes a question from a form
      Parameters:
      UFID - The unique identifier of the form
      questionIndex - The index of the question to be deleted in the form's question list
      Throws:
      FormException - if there was an error deleting the question (IdNotFoundException)

    • modfyQuestion

      public void modfyQuestion(int UFID, int questionIndex, String newText) throws FormException
      Modifies a question's text in a form
      Parameters:
      UFID - The unique identifier of the form
      questionIndex - The index of the question to be modified in the form's question list
      newText - The new text for the question
      Throws:
      FormException - if there was an error modifying the question (IdNotFoundException)

    • changeTitle

      public void changeTitle(int UFID, String newTitle) throws FormException
      Changes the title of a form
      Parameters:
      UFID - The unique identifier of the form
      newTitle - The new title for the form
      Throws:
      FormException - if there was an error changing the title (IdNotFoundException, FormTitleInvalid)

    • changeDescription

      Parameters:
      UFID - The unique identifier of the form
      newDescription - The new description for the form
      Throws:
      FormException - if there was an error changing the description (IdNotFoundException)

    • deleteForm

      public boolean deleteForm(int UFID) throws FormException
      Deletes a form by its UFID
      Parameters:
      UFID - The unique identifier of the form
      Returns:
      Calls a function in DataManager to delete the form and returns the result. True if deleted successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      FormException - if there was an error deleting the form (IdNotFoundException)

    • newAnsweredForm

      public void newAnsweredForm(int formID) throws FormException
      Registers that the active profile has answered a form
      Parameters:
      formID - The unique identifier of the form
      Throws:
      FormException - if there was an error registering the answered form (IdNotFoundException)

    • answerForm

      public void answerForm(int formID, int usrID, ArrayList<String> allAnswers) throws FormException
      Answers a form
      Parameters:
      formID - The unique identifier of the form
      usrID - The unique identifier of the user answering the form
      allAnswers - An ArrayList of Strings containing all answers to the form's questions
      Throws:
      FormException - if there was an error answering the form (IdNotFoundException, InvalidAnswerCountException, InvalidMultipleChoiceAnswerException, InvalidAnswerChoiceException, InvalidAnswerFormatException, InvalidAnswerRangeException)

    • importFormFromJson

      public void importFormFromJson(String path, Profile p) throws IOException, FormException, InvalidQuestionTypeException
      Imports a form from a JSON file Expected format: { "title": "Encuesta de Satisfacción", "description": "Queremos conocer tu opinión sobre el servicio.", "questions": [ { "type": "OPEN_ENDED", "text": "¿Qué opinas del producto?" }, { "type": "NUMERIC", "text": "¿Qué nota le pondrías al producto?", "min": 1, "max": 5 }, { "type": "MULTIPLE_CHOICE", "text": "¿Cómo calificarías el servicio?", "options": ["Excelente", "Bueno", "Regular", "Malo"] } ] }
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the JSON file
      Throws:
      IOException - if there was an error reading the file
      FormException - if there was an error importing the form (InvalidFormStructureException, FormTitleInvalid, InvalidQuestionTypeException, InvalidQuestionTextException, InvalidChoicesException, InvalidQuestionBoundsException)
      InvalidQuestionTypeException

    • importAnswersFromCsv

      public HashMap<Integer,ArrayList<String>> importAnswersFromCsv(int formID, String path) throws IOException, FormException
      Import answers CSV where the file is organized per-user and contains answers to a single (fixed) form. Expected format: Header line (ignored) ResponderUUID, Answer1, Answer2, Answer3, ... ResponderUUID, Answer1, Answer2, Answer3, ...
      Parameters:
      formID - The UFID of the form to which the answers correspond
      path - Path to CSV file
      Returns:
      Map from responder UUID to the list of answers they provided
      Throws:
      IOException - if there was an error reading the file
      FormException - if there was an error importing the answers (InvalidFormFile, IdNotFoundException, FormAlreadyAnsweredException)

    • processImportedAnswers

      public void processImportedAnswers(int formID, HashMap<Integer,ArrayList<String>> answersByUser) throws FormException
      Processes imported answers by registering each user as having answered the form and saving their responses
      Parameters:
      formID - The UFID of the form
      answersByUser - Map from user UUID to their list of answers
      Throws:
      FormException - if there was an error processing the answers

    • importAnswersFromCsvUserFixed

      public HashMap<Integer,ArrayList<String>> importAnswersFromCsvUserFixed(String path) throws IOException, FormException
      Import answers CSV where the file is organized per-form and contains answers from a single (fixed) user. Expected format: Header line (ignored) UFID, Answer1, Answer2, Answer3, ... (Single line expected)
      Parameters:
      path - Path to CSV file
      Returns:
      Map from form UFID to the list of answers provided by the fixed user
      Throws:
      IOException - if there was an error reading the file
      FormException - if there was an error importing the answers (InvalidAnswerFile, IdNotFoundException, FormAlreadyAnsweredException)

    • getExistingFormsInfo

      public ArrayList<String> getExistingFormsInfo()
      Gets information about existing forms (concerning UFID, title, description, creator)
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Strings containing information about each existing form

    • addQuestionToForm

      public void addQuestionToForm(int formIndex, String text, String typeStr, ArrayList<String> options, Boolean ordered, Integer maxChoices, Integer minBound, Integer maxBound) throws FormException
      Adds a question to a form
      Parameters:
      formIndex - The unique identifier of the form
      text - The text of the question
      typeStr - The type of the question as a String
      options - The list of options for multiple choice questions
      ordered - Whether the multiple choice question is ordered
      maxChoices - The maximum number of choices for multiple choice questions
      minBound - The minimum bound for numeric questions
      maxBound - The maximum bound for numeric questions
      Throws:
      FormException - if there was an error adding the question (IdNotFoundException, InvalidQuestionTextException, InvalidQuestionTypeException, InvalidChoicesException, InvalidQuestionBoundsException)

    • getAnsweredFormsInfo

      public ArrayList<String> getAnsweredFormsInfo(Profile p)
      Gets information about the forms answered by the active profile
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Strings containing information about each answered form

    • deleteAnsweredForm

      public void deleteAnsweredForm(int formID, Profile p) throws FormException
      Deletes an answered form from the active profile
      Parameters:
      formID - The unique identifier of the form
      Throws:
      FormException - if there was an error deleting the answered form (IdNotFoundException)

    • hasUserAnsweredForm

      public boolean hasUserAnsweredForm(int formID, Profile p)
      Checks if the active profile has answered a specific form
      Parameters:
      formID - The unique identifier of the form
      Returns:
      true if the active profile has answered the form, false otherwise

    • modifyAnsweredForm

      public void modifyAnsweredForm(int formID, Profile p, ArrayList<String> newAnswers) throws FormException
      Modifies the answers to an answered form for the active profile
      Parameters:
      formID - The unique identifier of the form
      newAnswers - An ArrayList of Strings containing the new answers to the form's questions
      Throws:
      FormException - if there was an error modifying the answered form (IdNotFoundException, InvalidAnswerCountException, InvalidMultipleChoiceAnswerException, InvalidAnswerChoiceException, InvalidAnswerFormatException, InvalidAnswerRangeException)

    • executeKmeans

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> executeKmeans(int formID, Integer k) throws Exception
      Executes K-means clustering on a form
      Parameters:
      formID -
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of ArrayLists of Strings, each inner list represents a cluster with the representative's username followed by the members' usernames
      Throws:
      FormException
      Exception

    • evaluateCluster

      public double evaluateCluster(int formID, Integer k) throws Exception
      Evaluates the clustering of a form
      Parameters:
      formID -
      Returns:
      double representing the evaluation score of the clustering
      Throws:
      FormException - if there was an error evaluating the clustering (IdNotFoundException, FormException)
      Exception

    • chartAffinityGroups

      public void chartAffinityGroups(int formID) throws Exception
      Shows the chart for the affinity groups of form, uses eigenvalues. Expects affinity groups to be created beforehand.
      Parameters:
      formID -
      Throws:
      FormException
      Exception

    • exportForm

      public void exportForm(int formID, String exportPath) throws FormException, IOException
      Exports a form to a JSON file
      Parameters:
      formID - The unique identifier of the form
      exportPath - The path where the JSON file will be saved
      Throws:
      FormException - if there was an error exporting the form (IdNotFoundException)
      IOException - if there was an I/O error during export

    • exportFormResults

      public void exportFormResults(int formUFID, String filePath) throws IOException
      Exports the affinity group results of a form to a specified file path.
      Parameters:
      formUFID - UFID of the Form
      filePath - Path where the results will be saved (including filename and extension)
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
